*div1 type="body"*
*p**p**location_mentioned*Natchez */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="07-08-1827">July 8th 1827*/date_mentioned**/p* Dr. Sir*/p*
*p*I have heard you express a wish to have a *person_mentioned*physician */person_mentioned*in the *location_mentioned*neighborhood */location_mentioned*of your *location_mentioned*plantation */location_mentioned*on the river. *person_mentioned*Doctor Lyman Cronkrite*/person_mentioned* the *person_mentioned*bearer */person_mentioned*of this is looking out for a situation to locate himself as a practitioner of medicine. He has been recommended as a worthy young man well qualified for the duties of his profession.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Saml A Cartwright*/person_mentioned**/p* *p*[Addressed:] *person_mentioned*Ira Lewis Esqr*/person_mentioned**/p*
